post:
At [HostPaedia](https://hostpaedia.com/sales/cart.php?gid=2) we ensure that you pay and get access to limitless services of hosting according to your requirements.

We have recently added an Exclusive Plan recently and would like to give some details regarding the same.

    I) EU Exclusive : ($5/mo)
    Core: 1
    Memory: 1024MB
    Swap Memory: 512MB
    Disk Space: 100GB
    Traffic: 1024GB
    1 Free IP

[BUY EU Exclusive](https://hostpaedia.com/sales/cart.php?a=add&pid=20)

_This plan includes:_

KVM Server with guaranteed resource
Intel Xeon Server
Full Root access
Secured VPS with free IPTables Firewall
Manage your VPS with Virtualizor Panel
VNC enabled
High Performance and Reliability
Daily, Weekly, Monthly backup's of VPS
Database Backup also available
24/7/365 support

_Addon's Available on Demand:_

**WHMCS, Cpanel, Softaculous**

(_Note:_ Please contact us at sales@hostpaedia.com for details about the charges for each addon.)

_Operating Systems we support for every VPS:_

*Fedora
*Ubuntu 
*CentOS 
*Debian 
*Suse

[Hostpaedia](https://hostpaedia.com/sales/cart.php?gid=2) is into delivering best services to our clients.
In addition to all these features and facts listed above, we are using **Virtualizor for managing VPS**.

Please read our Terms of Service carefully before investing in any plan. 
[Terms of Service](https://hostpaedia.com/terms.html)

If you have any queries or questions related to VPS please drop in a mail to us at sales@hostpaedia.com we will definitely assist you.
